p: To systematically investigate the effects of temperature, stress and grain size on the creep process, three different levels of stress (1.5, 2.0 and 2.5 GPa) were applied on the three different grain size models (6.5, 4.5 and 3.8 nm) at different temperatures (1200 and 1400 K). Figure 2 shows the evolution of strain with time for nanocrystalline NiAl.
